name: CloudLoadTest

helpMarkDown: Runs the load test in cloud; Powered by VS Online
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: TestDrop
inputs.label: Load test files folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from build source directory on the agent under which the load test solution output is placed.

inputs.name: LoadTest
inputs.label: Load test file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the load test filename under the test drop folder defined above.

inputs.name: TestSettings
inputs.label: Test settings file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the test settings filename under the test drop folder defined above.

inputs.name: ThresholdLimit
inputs.label: Number of permissible threshold violations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of threshold violations above which the load test outcome is considered unsucessful.
